description: This file sets up an agent with a deep infrastructure model, runs a prompt to generate a horror story, and prints the response, serving as a script for interacting with a language model via the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of running prompts and managing responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

classes.name: DeepInfra
classes.description: Model class representing the deep infrastructure model used by the agent.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with streaming response enabled.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response for a given prompt, streaming the output.
